telephony_line_password_rule_special: Must contain numbers, unaccented letters or {{list}}
telephony_line_password_rule_class: Contains at least two types of character (numbers, letters, special characters)
telephony_line_password_rule_palindrome: Must not be a palindrome (e.g. rotor, kayak)
telephony_line_password_explaination1: The password must contain between 8 and 20 characters.
telephony_line_password_explaination2: Your password must contain at least two types of character (numbers, letters, special characters).
telephony_line_password_save_success: The SIP line password has been changed.
telephony_line_password_save_fail: Unable to change the password for your SIP line. Please try again later.
telephony_line_password_bulk_all_success: Your new password has been applied to the selected services.
telephony_line_password_bulk_some_succes: Your new password has been applied to {{ count }} of the selected services.
telephony_line_password_bulk_error: Your new password could not be applied to the following services:
telephony_line_password_bulk_on_error: Oops! An error occurred while changing the password.
